battle_traits.name: Moon
battle_traits.description: Grots are always vicious little monsters, but when their god's light falls upon them, they become an order of magnitude more dangerous.
battle_traits.effect: During the battle, an area of the battlefield will be the Bad Moon's location (see 'The Bad Moon's Orbit'). The Bad Moon's location will be either a quarter of the battlefield or the centre of the battlefield. While the Bad Moon's location is a quarter of the battlefield, all Gloomspite Gitz units (friendly and enemy) wholly within that quarter are under the light of the Bad Moon. While the Bad Moon's location is the centre of the battlefield, all Gloomspite Gitz units (friendly and enemy) on the battlefield are under the light of the Bad Moon. While a friendly Gloomspite Gitz unit is under the light of the Bad Moon, the appropriate effect below applies to it: Frothing Zealots: If the unit is a non-Squig Moonclan unit, add 3 to its control score. Lunar Squigs: If the unit is a Squig unit, you can re-roll the random characteristic roll for its Move characteristic. Moonlit Hide: If the unit is a Troggoth unit, add 1 to save rolls for it. Spiderfang Venom: If the unit is a Spiderfang unit, its combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

battle_traits.name: The Bad Moon'S Orbit
battle_traits.description: The Bad Moon hurtles around the realms in madcap orbits, empowering its worshippers and troubling all others with insane visions.
battle_traits.declare: You must use this ability at the start of the battle round. If multiple players are commanding a Gloomspite Gitz army, then instead, at the start of the battle round, those players roll off and only the winner declares and uses this ability this battle round.
battle_traits.effect: If it is the first battle round, pick a quarter of the battlefield to be the Bad Moon's starting location. If it is the second or subsequent battle round, roll a dice. On a 1-3, the Bad Moon stays at its current location. On a 4+, the Bad Moon moves. The first time the Bad Moon moves, it moves to the centre of the battlefield. The second time it moves, it moves to the quarter diagonally opposite the quarter in which it started. The third time it moves, it moves off the battlefield and has no further effect on the battle.

Squigalanche.name: Bouncing Fury
Squigalanche.description: A veritable tide of vicious, impossibly hungry, fang- toothed monsters boing into enemy lines, biting, chewing and swallowing their victims whole.
Squigalanche.effect: Each time a friendly Squig unit charges, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Fang-filled Gobs, Massive Fang-filled Gobs or Huge Fang- filled Gobs for the rest of the turn.

Moonclan Skrap.name: Spreading Loonacy
Moonclan Skrap.description: When Moonclan grots gather, the energies of the Gloomspite surge through them like a tide, sending them frothing mad.
Moonclan Skrap.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly non-Squig Moonclan units in combat to be the targets.
Moonclan Skrap.effect: For each target: * Make a pile-in move with the target. * Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

Troggherd.name: Herd Healing
Troggherd.description: When troggoths gather in larger numbers, the sheer troggness of the herd serves as a catalyst for their regenerative abilities.
Troggherd.effect: Each time a friendly Troggoth unit uses a Fight ability, after that ability has been resolved, Heal (D3) that unit.

Spiderfang Stalktribe.name: Realmweb Ambush
Spiderfang Stalktribe.description: Scuttling into battle on magical, realm-spanning webs, there is no way to predict where a Spiderfang Stalktribe will launch their next ambush.
Spiderfang Stalktribe.effect: Each time a friendly Skitterstrand Arachnarok uses the 'Realmweb Lurker' ability, you can pick another friendly Spiderfang unit to also use that ability. In addition, each time a friendly Skitterstrand Arachnarok uses the 'Ambush from Beyond' ability, you can pick another friendly Spiderfang unit that is skittering through tunnels in reality to also use that ability. That unit must be set up wholly within 12" of the Skitterstrand Arachnarok using the ability.

heroic_traits.name: The Clammy Hand
heroic_traits.description: This boss is obviously destined for great things and can call upon vast troglodytic hordes.
heroic_traits.effect: Each time a friendly Gloomspite Gitz unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the 'Rally' command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

heroic_traits.name: Loontouched
heroic_traits.description: This warlord's magical prowess is boosted by the Bad Moon's light.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is not a Wizard, it has Wizard (1). Otherwise, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.

heroic_traits.name: Fight Another Day
heroic_traits.description: This warlord has mastered the ignoble art of striking then running away before the enemy can hit back.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

artefacts_of_power.name: The Clammy Cowl
artefacts_of_power.description: This enchanted hood wreathes its wearer in damp gloom, causing enemies to swing wildly at their blurred outline and weapons to slip in suddenly moistened palms.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

artefacts_of_power.name: Backstabber'S Blade
artefacts_of_power.description: A slitta made from pure shadow and malice, this blade always finds its victim's weak spots.
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

artefacts_of_power.name: Leering Gitshield
artefacts_of_power.description: The spiteful enchantments woven into this hideous shield ensure terrible misfortune falls on any who dare attack its bearer.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Each time an unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Attack ability has been resolved.

Lore Of The Clammy Dank.name: Sneaky Distr Action
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.description: The shaman's unnaturally shrill cries and magical light-show hypnotically draw the attention of their foes.
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.declare: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are wholly within 12" of the caster.

Lore Of The Clammy Dank.name: The Hand Of Gork
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.description: A ghostly hand picks up a mob of gitz and plonks them back down where they are most needed.
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.declare: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of them and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Lore Of The Clammy Dank.name: Spore Maws
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.description: The caster causes the thick spores around them to coalesce into gnashing green mouths.
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.declare: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, pick up to 3 visible enemy units within 12" of them to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of The Clammy Dank.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

manifestation_lore.name: Mushroom
manifestation_lore.description: The shaman takes a small mushroom and hurls it with all his might. When it lands, it sprouts impossibly quickly into a gigantic skullshroom, a fungus said to grow between Mork's own toes.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Mork's Mighty Mushroom on the battlefield, pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Mork's Mighty Mushroom wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

manifestation_lore.name: Summon Scuttletide
manifestation_lore.description: The shaman grasps a small jade amulet in which a skullback spider is imprisoned and uses it to call forth a seething mass of the trapped creature's kin.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Scuttletide on the battlefield, pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Scuttletide wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestation_lore.name: SUMMON MALEVOLENT MOON:
manifestation_lore.description: The shaman transforms a loonstone statue into a huge glowing terror and lets it loose on the battlefield.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Malevolent Moon on the battlefield, pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Malevolent Moon wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestation_lore.name: Ar Achnacauldron
manifestation_lore.description: The shaman whistles loudly, calling the squealing, bubbling Scrapskuttle's Arachnacauldron to their side.
manifestation_lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Scrapskuttle's Arachnacauldron on the battlefield, pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
manifestation_lore.effect: Set up a Scrapskuttle's Arachnacauldron wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per Spell ability.
abilities.description: Tuskbreaker has the power to guard Kragnos against even the most potent magical force.

abilities.name: Avatar Of Destruction
abilities.description: Kragnos is the embodiment of Ghur's relentless ferocity. No single strike can lay him low.
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: R Ampaging Destruction
abilities.description: Kragnos rampages through the press of his foes, his hooves flattening all in his path.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects: * Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll. * Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

abilities.name: The End Of Empires
abilities.description: Where Kragnos goes, the hordes of Destruction follow.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly Destruction units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.reaction_condition: You declared  the 'The Bad Moon's Orbit' ability
abilities.name: The Loonking'S Entreaty
abilities.description: The captive seers and prophets of Skragrott's asylum can sometimes predict when the Bad Moon will accelerate or slow in its erratic orbits of the Mortal Realms. Skragrott uses this information to convince his followers that the Bad Moon listens when he entreats it to halt or move to a specific location.
abilities.effect: You can choose whether the Bad Moon moves to the next location or stays in its current location instead of rolling the dice. 7

abilities.name: Babbling Wand
abilities.description: This jabbering wand, said to be topped with the skull of the great prophet Kaloth, channels the voices of Skragrott's imprisoned scryers through clacking teeth.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.
keywords: command for a friendly Moonclan unit

abilities.name: I'M Da Boss
abilities.description: Loonbosses are terrible bullies and braggarts with a wicked talent for coercing other grots.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Moonclan Stabbas unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick one of the following effects: Get Back 'Ere!: If the target is not in combat, you can return D6 slain models to it. Stab 'Em Good!: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target's attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Brews
abilities.description: Gobbapalooza shamans drink hallucinogenic fungus brew before the battle begins, making them almost impervious to pain. However, as the battle progresses, the effects start to wear off.
abilities.effect: In the first battle round, this unit has Ward (4+). In the second battle round, this unit has Ward (5+). In the third and subsequent battle rounds, this unit has Ward (6+).

abilities.name: GOBBAPALOOZA KNOW-WOTZ:
abilities.description: From casting petty spells to scaring the other grots with bizarre performances, the Gobbapalooza is always up to something.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects: Glareface Dance: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz unit within this unit's combat range. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn. Nasty Poisons: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz unit within this unit's combat range. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit's weapons until the start of your next turn. Mesmerise: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit. Until the start of your next turn, that unit cannot use commands.

abilities.name: Secret Tunnels
abilities.description: Rabble-Rowzas have a knack for locating hidden passages through the depths.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve in a secret tunnel. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Emerge From The Depths
abilities.description: The Rabble-Rowza emerges from a little- known tunnel network beneath the battlefield, ready to stir up trouble.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is in a secret tunnel.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Catch Me!'
abilities.description: With an infuriating taunt, the Rabble-Rowza riles up a lumbering beast, sending it into a blood-mad frenzy. A cunning trick, as long as the Rabble- Rowza isn't close enough to get caught!
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Monster or Beast unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target can use Charge abilities even if it used a Run ability in the same turn, but each time it uses a Move ability, it must end the move closer to this unit. In addition, for the rest of the turn, the first time the target ends a move within this unit's combat range, inflict D6 mortal damage on this unit.

abilities.name: Deffcap Mushroom
abilities.description: The Fungoid Cave-Shamans claim that eating Deffcaps allows them to commune with those who have passed on to the 'Great Green'. Though such is debatable, the mushroom's effect on the shaman's spellcasting abilities is beyond doubt.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit's power level for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Feedin' Time
abilities.description: Squigbosses possess a deep knowledge of all types of fungi and bring the most potent kinds into battle to feed to their squigs.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Squig unit within this unit's combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn: Crimson Deffcap: Add 3" to the target's Move characteristic. Yellow Lurka: The target's Fang-filled Gobs, Huge Fang-filled Gobs or Massive Fang-filled Gobs have Crit (Mortal).

abilities.name: Squig R Age
abilities.description: As Mangler Squigs are wounded in battle, they become even more irate and violent.
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Huge Fang-filled Gobs is 6.

abilities.name: Bite Da Moon!
abilities.description: With a manic shriek, the Loonboss drives nearby squigs into an even greater frenzy, goading them to crash through the enemy's lines with all haste so that they can continue their pursuit of the Bad Moon.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and all friendly Squig units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for the targets' Fang-filled Gobs, Massive Fang- filled Gobs and Huge Fang-filled Gobs for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Watch Out!
abilities.description: Mangler Squigs are capable of great destruction even in their wildly bouncing death throes.
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within this unit's combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

abilities.name: Ker-Splat!
abilities.description: Mangler Squigs produce an impact that is nothing short of spectacular, sending severed body parts and splashes of gore skywards.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit, to a maximum of 10. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Squig R Age
abilities.description: As Mangler Squigs are wounded in battle, they become even more irate and violent.
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Huge Fang-filled Gobs is 6.

abilities.name: Giant Boing!
abilities.description: The Mangler Squigs use their momentum to spring up into the air, crashing into the enemy lines beyond.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 3D6" but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Watch Out!
abilities.description: Mangler Squigs are capable of great destruction even in their wildly bouncing death throes.
abilities.effect: If this unit is destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice for each enemy unit within this unit's combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

abilities.name: Looncap Mushrooms
abilities.description: Looncaps that sprout beneath the Bad Moon's glare are harvested by Sneaky Snufflers and have an intoxicating effect on any grots that ingest them. Sometimes a particularly potent fungus is found - and that's when the real carnage starts…
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a visible friendly Moonclan unit wholly within 12" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is under the light of the Bad Moon. On a 3+, the target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn. On a 6+, also add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Can'T Catch Us!
abilities.description: Snarlfang Riders encircle the enemy, keeping their distance and filling their targets with arrows before they finally close in for the kill.
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, this unit can move D6". It cannot end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Hidden Loons
abilities.description: Gibbering and bound, Loonsmasha Fanatics are dragged or carried along by the general mass of grots until the time arrives to unrestrain them and pray to the Bad Moon that they head in the right direction.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve hidden among the mobs. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: One might as well try to catch a cannonball as to get the jump on a spinning Fanatic.
abilities.effect: This unit has Strike-first.

abilities.name: Release The Fanatics!
abilities.description: As the enemy approaches, the Loonsmashas are unleashed.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is hidden among the mobs. Then, pick a friendly Moonclan Shootas or Moonclan Stabbas unit that has 10 or more models to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: A PROD IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION:
abilities.description: As battle begins, grots like to give the Sporesplattas a helpful prod towards the enemy.
abilities.effect: This unit can use the 'Normal Move' ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Puffshroom Frenzy
abilities.description: Puffshroom spore-clouds send the followers of the Bad Moon into a violent frenzy while choking and blinding enemies caught within them.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by other friendly Moonclan units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Netters
abilities.description: Moonclan grots use throwing nets to capture Cave Squigs and entangle their foes.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Netters
abilities.description: Moonclan grots use throwing nets to capture Cave Squigs and entangle their foes.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Squigs Gone Wild
abilities.description: Squigs don't always know when they're dead…
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: BEAST
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Herding Squigs
abilities.description: While they have a thankless and frankly dangerous job, Squig Herders do their best to keep their frenzied squigs together as a rough pack.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each Squig Herder in this unit. For each 2+, you can return D3 slain Cave Squigs to this unit. For each 1, 1 Squig Herder in this unit is slain.

abilities.name: Boing! Boing! Boing!
abilities.description: Squig Hoppers can cause considerable damage simply by bouncing on top of their foes as they make their way across the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit that passed across the target. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Boing! Smash!
abilities.description: Mobs of Boingrot Bounderz smash into their enemies like toothy meteors.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, when it uses the 'Malfunctioning Leystone' ability, roll 1 dice instead of 3.

abilities.name: Crushing Grip
abilities.description: The vice-like grasp of Trugg can squeeze the life out of all but the largest opponent.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target's Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Greater Regener Ation
abilities.description: After centuries spent bathing in the focused healing energies of Ghyran, Trugg is almost impossible to kill, even by troggoth standards.
abilities.effect: Heal (D6) this unit.

abilities.name: MALFUNCTIONING LEYSTONE:
abilities.description: Trugg can unwittingly channel powerful magic through the contraption on his back.
abilities.effect: Roll 3 dice. You must pick 1 of those dice and apply the effect that corresponds to its value. Effects 2-6 persist until the start of your next turn. 1 Glyph of Shyish: Inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit. 2 Glyph of Ghur: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Troggoth units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. 3 Glyph of Aqshy: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Troggoth units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. 4 Glyph of Hysh: This unit can use Unbind abilities as if it had Wizard (1). 5 Glyph of Ulgu: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly Troggoth units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. 6 Glyph of Chamon: This unit has Ward (5+).

abilities.name: SHEPHERD OF DESTRUCTION:
abilities.description: The Dankhold Troggboss bellows so loudly that the beasts of its herd come dangerously close to actually focusing their brutish efforts.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Troggoth units while they are within this unit's combat range.

abilities.name: Magical Resistance
abilities.description: The realmstone-infused mushrooms that Dankhold Troggoths consume make them naturally resistant to the effects of magic.
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit.

abilities.name: Magical Resistance
abilities.description: The realmstone- infused mushrooms that Dankhold Troggoths consume make them naturally resistant to the effects of magic.
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit.

abilities.name: Wade And Smash
abilities.description: The Dankhold Troggoth rampages through the enemy lines, swinging its enormous club back and forth and sending enemies flying in all directions.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, it can move 6" but must end that move in combat. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Regener Ation
abilities.description: Troggoths are able to regrow injured flesh almost as quickly as it is harmed.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Noxious Vomit
abilities.description: The bilious digestive fluids chucked up by a Fellwater Troggoth can swiftly corrode even sigmarite plate.
abilities.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by attacks made with this unit's Noxious Vomit, that unit is drenched in vomit until the start of your next turn. While a unit is drenched in vomit: * Subtract 1 from save rolls for that unit. * Ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for that unit.

abilities.name: Regener Ation
abilities.description: Troggoths are able to regrow injured flesh almost as quickly as it is harmed.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Wall Cr Awler
abilities.description: The Spiderfang's arachnid allies can skitter up and down vertical surfaces as if they were flat ground.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Web Slingshot
abilities.description: The Webspinner Shaman conjures a sheet of webbing that they then use to launch themselves across the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Spiderfang unit or terrain feature within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 3" of the target and more than 9" from all enemy units. 6

abilities.name: SPEED OF THE SPIDER GOD:
abilities.description: With a shriek, the shaman calls upon the Spider God to imbue its worshippers with preternatural speed.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Spiderfang unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target can use a Run ability this turn and still use Shoot and/or Charge abilities later in the turn.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Wall Cr Awler
abilities.description: The Spiderfang's arachnid allies can skitter up and down vertical surfaces as if they were flat ground.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Vor Acious Predator
abilities.description: Young Arachnarok Spiders are swift hunters despite their immense size, with an unquenchable hunger for living prey.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 1" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage equal to the roll on that target.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Wall Cr Awler
abilities.description: The Spiderfang's arachnid allies can skitter up and down vertical surfaces as if they were flat ground.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Catchweb Spidershrine
abilities.description: This ramshackle altar to the Spider God shimmers with malevolent arcane energy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Spiderfang Wizards while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Ensnaring Webbing
abilities.description: The Arachnarok singles out a target, temporarily immobilising it with looping strands of sticky webbing.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry Hero within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Realmweb Lurker
abilities.description: Skitterstrand Arachnaroks stalk their prey through the arcane paths that connect the realms.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve skittering through tunnels in reality. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Ambush From Beyond
abilities.description: Legs first, then bulbous body, the Skitterstrand drags itself out of a tear in reality.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is skittering through tunnels in reality.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Wall Cr Awler
abilities.description: The Spiderfang's arachnid allies can skitter up and down vertical surfaces as if they were flat ground.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Scuttling Terror
abilities.description: The Arachnarok uses its terrifying speed to its advantage, scuttling over and sinking its fangs into the enemy before they have a chance to react.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can pass through models in enemy Infantry units, but it must end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy Infantry unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Chitinous Legs is 6.

abilities.name: Flinger
abilities.description: This crude catapult hurls a heavy ball of corded spider-silk at the enemy. Any victims not crushed by the missile when it lands are engulfed by the mass of sticky webbing as it explosively unfurls.
abilities.effect: If any attacks made with this unit's Flinger score a hit, after the Shoot ability has been resolved, roll a dice. On a 2+, the target unit is entangled until the start of your next turn. Halve the Move characteristic of a unit while it is entangled.

abilities.name: Wall Cr Awler
abilities.description: The Spiderfang's arachnid allies can skitter up and down vertical surfaces as if they were flat ground.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Beast-Binding Webbing
abilities.description: As enemy beasts attempt to close the distance with an Arachnarok, they become tangled in its webbing.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target's Companion weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wall Cr Awler
abilities.description: The Spiderfang's arachnid allies can skitter up and down vertical surfaces as if they were flat ground.
abilities.effect: This Manifestation can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Endless Terrors
abilities.description: Bolstered by the presence of an Arachnarok, the arcanely blessed spiders of the Scuttletide will spill forth without cease, making them near impossible to get rid of.
abilities.effect: This unit has Ward (4+) while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly Arachnarok units.

abilities.name: Mutating Spores
abilities.description: The spores ejected by Mork's Mighty Mushroom cause those they touch to burst in a profusion of gruesome fungal growths.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units within 6" of this Manifestation to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For each target, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit that are within 6" of this Manifestation. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Lurid Light
abilities.description: To the maniacal grots of the Gloomspite Gitz, one cackling lunar entity streaking through the sky is much like another.
abilities.effect: Friendly Gloomspite Gitz units are under the light of the Bad Moon while they are wholly within 12" of this Manifestation.

abilities.name: BLESSINGS OF THE CAULDRON:
abilities.description: Scrapskuttle's Arachnacauldron grants great arcane power to the one brave or mad enough to call upon its aid.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Gloomspite Gitz Wizard within 1" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the target's power level until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Effigy Of Da Bad Moon
abilities.description: Larger loonstone meteorites are hacked painstakingly into crude but surprisingly lifelike effigies of the Bad Moon, and they hold a sliver of its lunar power.
abilities.effect: Friendly Gloomspite Gitz units are under the light of the Bad Moon while they are wholly within 12" of this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Moonclan Lairs
abilities.description: The Gloomspite Gitz use Moonclan-dug tunnels to reach nearby Loonshrines. In battle, reinforcements emerge from these echoing subterranean passages. 1
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero non-Monster non-War Machine Gloomspite Gitz unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this terrain feature and more than 3" from all enemy units.
